title: Piper Day's Ultimate Guide to Avoiding George Clooney
description:
Finding romance in the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most glamorous city isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t easy.
For Piper Day, fresh in town to work as a studio nurse on one of HollywoodÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s busiest backlots, finding love seems impossible. Two men who couldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be more different vie for her affection: a wildly wealthy actor who gleefully bathes in the adoration of his public and a sweet, humble teacher who works at the on-lot childcare center.

Throw in the task of having to avoid one of HollywoodÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s biggest celebrities or risk losing her job, PiperÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life is anything but smooth sailing.
On any given day, Piper can be helping a patient on the dusty set of a western or on the futuristic bridge of a starship or in the plush office of a studio executive.

These are the adventures of Piper Day, a life where reality and fantasy tango in the dream-soaked world of Tinseltown.
